message:
I would like to give thanks @ baserkellah " please post my this writing , I'm from Dubai ,, I can't control myself , I want join @ hefajotay Islam LONG MARCH ,, because this the right time throw the all nastik @ India or bay of Bengal,,, should be Allah save the Islam by hefajotay Islam ... Insaallah...inshallah.. Without victory please don't leave the road please please...must be Allah with us....ARIF 4m UAE
